item.title: Blocking pedestrian access, 30th August
item.description:
Grill shack have blocked pedestrians access to the pavement by placing obstacles making the pavement smaller. On such a congested pavement this is causing serious danger to vulnerable people. I have arthritis and this has caused me considerable pain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Upper Street, Islington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish from the newly located bins blowing into green space, 30th August
item.description:
Bins were re-located without consultation with locals. These bins are now being used for flytipping and what doesn't fit the bins are falling into the green behind.
Report on FixMyStreet
